item.title: Here I am on the infamous 'Gringo Killer' looking like a pack mule, but honestly? This section was all hype! Steep but short, there were way harder and longer climbs earlier on the trail. The real reward comes right after this though... hit the Sun Gate
item.description: Here I am on the infamous 'Gringo Killer' looking like a pack mule, but honestly? This section was all hype! Steep but short, there were way harder and longer climbs earlier on the trail. The real reward comes right after this though... hit the Sun Gate

item.title: 268 miles. Non-stop. Across the entire backbone of England from Derbyshire to Scotland. You have 156 hours (6.5 days) to finish or you're pulled from the course. No crew, no support, completely self-sufficient the entire way.You'll cross the Peak District

item.title: The full story of Crazy Mountain 100, Montana's newest Hardrock qualifier and one of the most brutal races I've ever attempted. This isn't your typical race recap. This is 100 miles of raw footage, real emotions, and unfiltered suffering through some of M

item.title: My 4 step process 1.) kt tape extreme 2.) lube feet (friction and waterproofing) 3.) good socks 4.) good shoes Crazy Mountain 100 was hard on the feet. Most due to all the rocks. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok
item.description: My 4 step process 1.) kt tape extreme 2.) lube feet (friction and waterproofing) 3.) good socks 4.) good shoes Crazy Mountain 100 was hard on the feet. Most due to all the rocks. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
